This movie format is ANAGLYPH (Red-Cyan)
I found this after I downloaded 5GB :(

Shame on the uploader for misleading people, I was hoping for a PROPER 3D format.

(note that anaglyph is the only format you can watch without special hardware. Get some red-cyan glasses off Deal Extreme and you'll be fine. ~$4USD)
